text_logic_form: Find the area of triangle JKM.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the area of triangle JKM.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line JK is 8.5 units.
The length of the line KM is 5 units.
The length of the line KL is 4 units.
The line KL is perpendicular to the line JM.
line_instances: There are lines JK, JM, and KM, forming triangle JKM.
